targets.query:
from(bucket: "EMS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "EMSJ2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "onMeters" or r["_field"] == "OffMeters")

  |> yield(name: "sum")
